title: IPv6 Teredo Parser
description: Parse Teredo IPv6 addresses to extract server IPv4, flags, mapped port, and client IPv4

tunneling.title: Teredo Tunneling:
tunneling.description: Allows IPv6 connectivity for hosts behind IPv4 NATs by encapsulating IPv6 packets in IPv4 UDP.

format.title: Address Format:
format.description: where components are encoded and obfuscated.

obfuscation.title: Obfuscation:
obfuscation.description: Client IP and port are XOR'ed to prevent some NATs from interfering with the tunnel.

input.label: Teredo IPv6 Address
input.help: Enter a Teredo IPv6 address (starts with 2001::/32)

teredoServer.title: Teredo Server
teredoServer.description: The Teredo relay server handling this tunnel

clientIPv4.title: Client IPv4
clientIPv4.description: The client's public IPv4 address (may be NAT address)

clientPort.title: Client Port
clientPort.description: The UDP port used by the client (may be NAT-mapped)

natType.title: NAT Detection
natType.description: Indicates the type of NAT the client is behind

explanation.title: Parsing Steps
explanation.step1: 1. Teredo prefix: {prefix} (identifies this as a Teredo tunnel)

errors.notTeredo: Not a valid Teredo address (must start with 2001::/32)
